meanings.definition: A person who makes an offer.
meanings.sent1: The offerers presented their proposals at the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The potential buyers were the offerers in the negotiation.
meanings.sent3: The offerers at the auction were quite competitive.
meanings.sent4: She stood out among the offerers with her unique approach.
meanings.sent5: The group of offerers showcased a variety of ideas.

meanings.sent1: The offerers arrived at the event together.
meanings.sent2: The offerers' opinions differed on the matter.
meanings.sent3: The offerers in the room seemed to be having a lively discussion.
meanings.sent4: Among the offerers, his voice was the loudest.
meanings.sent5: The offerers' presence added diversity to the group.
